shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” (fols. 4va-96vb) I-1) Introductory exhortation (fol. 4va-b) I-2) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 5ra-6vb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki … “I worship Thee…” (fols. 6vb-7rb) I-4) Täʾamrä Maryam: 132 miracles (fols. 7rb-96vb) I-5) ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi… “Does not the man…” (distributed among the miracles of Mary, fols. 8rb-30rb).
Additiones 1-3.

donors.donor: The following names are written in the supplication formulas: Gäbrä Śǝllase on fols. 76vb, 77va, 88va, possibly in the main hand; ʾabunä Täklä Haymanot on fols. 91ra, 93va (here effaced), 94va, 95rb, 96vb, in a secondary hand.

txstates.txstate: A few leaves are stained with water (fols. 9, 29). Fol. 13 has been enlarged by sewing a piece of parchment onto it. Tears amended on many leaves: e g., fols. 7, 8, 52, 68, 75, 91.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, criss-cross, double crescent with eye, interlaced line fillet, Maltese cross).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of the endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(4/fols. 1r-4v) – ፩I(6/fols. 5r-10v) – ፪II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – ፫III(8/fols. 19r-26v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – ፭V(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 35r-42v) – ፮VI(6/fols. 43r-48v) – ፯VII(6; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 49r-56v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 57r-64v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 65r-72v) – ፲X(8/fols. 73r-80v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 81r-88v) – ፲፪XII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 89r-96v) – ፪B(2/fols. 97r-98v).

taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe disregarded the ruling line on fol. 71va, ls. 1-4. The ruling on fol. 1 has been done crudely. Fol. 97 is partly unruled.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of the Ethiopic numerals.
Two lines on the incipit column of Text I-2, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of Texts I-1, I-3 and each miracle of Text I-4; first one or two words of each strophe of Text I-5.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ማ፡ for ማርያም፡ (fol. 4va-b) ማር፡ for ማርያም፡ (fol. 4va-b, 23ra) አ፡ for አሜን፡ (e.g., fol. 8vb, 27ra, 39rb, 45vb, 71ra, 85va, 94ra) አሜ፡ for አሜን፡ (fol. 60rb) ለ፡ አ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 53ra, 59ra, 69rb) ለ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 11rb, 37rb, 78ra, 88vb) ለ፡ ዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 88va) ለአ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 22ra) ለዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 70rb, 83ra) ለዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 87va) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 91ra, 94va) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 83va, 85ra, 86rb) ለዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 63rb, 70rb, 77rb) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 7rb, 14vb, 35rb, 49rb, 82rb, 89va) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 74va, 76vb, 82vb) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 26ra, 50va, 62rb, 72va, 79va, 81vb) ለዓ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 9rb, 56ra, 67va, 76rb, 80rb, 89rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 47ra, 63vb, 66ra) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 53ra) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 57ra, 71rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol.84ra) ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fols. 23va, 65ra) ምስ፡ አሜን፡ for ምስሌነ፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 42va).

otherdetails.otherdetail: All the miracles are numbered. The numbers 50, 81 and 87 were not used, the numbers 65, 80 and 88 were used twice. The 1st miracle is followed by the hymn: Sobä ṣäḥafä Däqsǝyos täʾamriha ʿǝludä ... "When Däqsǝyos wrote the collection of her miracles ..." (fol. 8rb, ls. 7-11). Text II-5 comprises 32 strophes which are strophes 1-32 according to GrohHymn pp. 336-53.

additional.cont: Fol. 2va-b: ˀƎsäggəd lä-mäläkotəkä zä-fäṭärkä ṣəlmätä… “I worship Thy Godhead that created the darkness…” (cp. ChRep no. 335).
additional.det: The note is possibly written in the main hand. Each daily reading is separated by a chain of red and black dots.

The note is possibly written in the main hand and contains the following hymns: ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam wäladitä [ʾamlak] ʾǝmmu lä-ʾǝgziʾǝnä ʾiyäsus Krǝstos kähali… “O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Godbearing, Mother of our Lord Jesus Christ the Almighty…” (cp. ChRep no. 373); Sälam läki Maryam ʾǝmmä nädd wä-ʾǝmmä wahǝd ʾǝmmä nǝṣuḥ wä-ʾǝmmä mäśiḥ… “Salutation to you, Mary, Mother of the flame and Mother of the unique One, Mother of the pure One and Mother of the Messiah”.

additional.cont: Fols. 3vb l.16-4ra: Calendaric note.
additional.det: The note is written in Gǝʿǝz and Amharic and indicates the computation of the time since the creation of the world. The second part on fol. 4ra has been erased.

extras.extra: - The scribe reduced the size of his handwriting to accommodate the end of the line: fols. 6va, 18vb, 26rb. - The scribe used compressed script: fols. 2rb. - Omitted letters, words or passages inserted interlineally in brilliant crimson ink: e.g., fols. 2rb, 2vb, 5ra, 5va, 6rb, 8va. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally in black ink: e.g., fols. 6ra, 9vb, 45va, 80va, 88ra. - Erasure: fol. 37va. - Corrections written over erasures in the main hand: fols. 12rb, 18rb, 28rb, 54va. - Corrections written over erasure in a secondary hand in red ink: fol. 29ra. - Spaces for rubrication left unfilled (for the name of the donor?): fols. 7rb, 8rb, 9rb, 10va, 12vb etc. - Scribbles: fols. 1r, 18r, 53v, 97v. - Crude notes in pencil: fols. 53v, 97r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks are written in the upper margin of fols. 5r: ፩ (three times), 11r: ፪ (three times), 19r: ፫ (three times), 27r: ፬, 35r: ፭, 43r: ፮, 49r: ፯, 57r: ፰, 65r: ፱, 73r: ፲, 81r: ፲፩, 89r: ፲፪, 97r: ፪.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the days or the feasts, written in the upper margin or interlineally: ዘሰኑይ፡: fol. 2ra ሠሉስ፡: fol. 2rb ዘረቡዕ፡: fol. 2rb (interlineally) አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለጥር፡ ዕረፍታ፡: fol. 89va (in a frame) - A coloured thread has been inserted in the upper corner of fol. 89.

frames.frame: Fol. 1va (incipit page of Additio 1): coloured (crimson, yellow) ornamental band; geometrical motifs.
